table_caption: Diffusion changes between HC and AD.
table_foot: Regions of significant alterations identified as FA reductions and as MD, RD, and AxD increases. WBA, widespread brain alteration; WCA, widespread cerebrum alteration; CRBL, cerebellum; ThR, thalamic radiation; PhT, parahippocampal tract; CC, corpus callosum; CST, corticospinal tract; CB, cingulum bundle.
